availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Johnson H. Freeman (Madison County, KY, physician)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, physician. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Waltrup Freeman in Madison County on December 31, 1844. Stepfather of William Waltrup, Nancy Waltrup, James Waltrup, and Lucy Waltrup. Married to Eliza Jane Hill Freeman in Madison County in 1863. Stepfather of Elizabeth Freeman and Rebecca Freeman. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Physician in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 227A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183302, p. 181.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183302, p. 333.
